p.span:
Attention current Dennis/Test 5th, 6th and 7th graders!
Hibberd's Early College Open Enrollment is now open for the 2020-2021 school year.
Please apply online by clicking here by Friday, May 15, 2020

span.a: Frequently Asked Questions about RCS Extended Learning Plan

p.span: The following Extended Learning Plans were approved by the RCS School Board on 4/8/2020:

span.a: RCS COVID-19 Student Extended Learning Plan.pdf
RCS COVID-19 Student Extended Learning Plan SPANISH.pdf

p.span: For additional information on RCS Technology Help Desk, click HERE.

li.span: Click HERE for resources and information about the Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 virus (UPDATED 4/17/2020 3:30 P.M.)
Click here for Tips on how to keep kids physically and mentally healthy during this time. (4/17/2020 3:30 p.m.)

p.strong: Update from Dr. Todd Terrill (4/2/2020 2:30 P.M.)

hr.p: Dr. McCormick, our State Superintendent, issued a statement this afternoon that all schools will remain closed for the remainder of the school year. We know this announcement creates many questions and we are working on a plan with our administrators and teachers to find the best solutions.

In the next few days, the Indiana Department of Education will be providing additional guidance and we will formulate our plan based on this information. Next week we will announce our plan that will include :

ul.li: Future Opportunities (For example, Summer Plans and 2020/2021 school year plans)

hr.p: We ask that our families continue to check for district messages and visit weRrichmond.com for updates.
Please take care of yourselves and stay positive! We will make it through this. We R Richmond!

li.span: If you have questions, send them to QuestionsAtRCS@rcs.k12.in.us
